content: free pattern - f33 martine hat by lisa r myers all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 12/14/12 © fairmount fibers ltd 2012 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 3 free pattern - f33 size gauge women s medium band circumference about 20 6 sts = 1 over st john s wort stitch with larger ndls materials pattern stitch manos del uruguay fino 70% extrafine merino 30% silk st john s wort stitch multiple of 5 sts approx 100g/490 yds 1 skip shown in 401 corsage rnds 1 and 2 *p1 k3 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 3 *p1 slip 1 knitwise with yarn in back k2 pass slipped us 6/4 25mm ndls 16 circular and dpn or size to obtain st over 2 knit sts p1 repeat from * to end of round gauge round 4 *p1 k1 yo k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round us 3/3 25mm ndls 16 circular repeat these 4 rnds for pattern ring marker all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 12/14/12 © fairmount fibers ltd 2012 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 3 free pattern - f33 instructions round 5 decrease *slip 2 sts together knitwise with yarn in back with smaller needle co 120 sts join being careful not to k1 pass 2 slipped sts over p1 slip 1 knitwise with yarn in twist sts and place marker to show beginning of round work back k2 pass slipped st over p1 repeat from * to end of round in k1 p1 ribbing for 1¼ next round change to larger circular 75 sts ndl and increase *p1 k1 yo k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 6 *k1 p1 k1 yo k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round 90 150 sts work 54 rnds in st john s wort pattern thus ending sts having just worked round 2 rnds 7 and 8 *k1 p1 k3 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 9 decrease *k1 p1 slip 1 knitwise with yarn in back k2tog shape top pass slipped st over p1 repeat from * to end of round 60 sts change to dpn when necessary round 10 *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st of round do not work round 1 decrease *p1 slip 1 knitwise with yarn in back k2tog last st remove marker pass slipped st over p2 slip 1 knitwise with yarn in back k2 round 11 decrease k2tog around 30 sts pass slipped st over p1 repeat from * to end of round 105 sts round 2 *p1 k1 p2 k1 yo k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round finishing 120 sts cut yarn leaving 9 tail thread yarn through remaining sts rnds 3 and 4 *p1 k1 p2 k3 p1 repeat
